lasermaze

Interface Maze

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyMaze

    public interface Maze
    This is a interface. This interface provides basic functions to solve a Laser Maze. Please create your own Laser Maze game class by implementing this interface.
    Author:
    Jingran

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFinalCoordinationX()
      Get the X coordination of the final coordination.
      int getFinalCoordinationY()
      Get the Y coordination of the final coordination.
      int getLength()
      Get the number of the squares traveled by the laser light before the light come out of the maze.
      MazeParameters getMazeParameters()
      Get the initial parameters of the laser maze game.
      void readParametersFromFile(java.lang.String inputFile)
      Get the initial parameters of the laser maze game from the input file.
      void solveMaze(Status current, MyMirror[][] mirrors, int m, int n)
      Function to find a solution of the Laser Maze game.
      void writeResultFile(java.lang.String outputFile)
      Write the result of the laser maze game to file.

    • Method Detail

      • readParametersFromFile

        void readParametersFromFile(java.lang.String inputFile)
        Get the initial parameters of the laser maze game from the input file. Need to be implemented.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - file name of the input file. Make sure to include path of the file.

      • solveMaze

        void solveMaze(Status current,
               MyMirror[][] mirrors,
               int m,
               int n)
        Function to find a solution of the Laser Maze game.
        Parameters:
        current - the current status of the laser light.
        mirrors - an array telling how the mirrors are put in the maze grid. Each array element is a Mirror entity.
        m - the length of the maze grid
        n - the width of the maze grid

      • writeResultFile

        void writeResultFile(java.lang.String outputFile)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Write the result of the laser maze game to file. Need to be implemented.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the name of the output file. Make sure to include path of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • getMazeParameters

        MazeParameters getMazeParameters()
        Get the initial parameters of the laser maze game. Need to be implemented.
        Returns:
        the initial parameters of the game.

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        Get the number of the squares traveled by the laser light before the light come out of the maze. Should return -1 if there is loop in the laser light travel path.
        Returns:
        number of the squares traveled

      • getFinalCoordinationX

        int getFinalCoordinationX()
        Get the X coordination of the final coordination. Should return Integer.MIN_VALUE if there is loop in the laser light travel path.
        Returns:
        X coordination of the final coordination

      • getFinalCoordinationY

        int getFinalCoordinationY()
        Get the Y coordination of the final coordination. Should return Integer.MIN_VALUE if there is loop in the laser light travel path.
        Returns:
        Y coordination of the final coordination
